mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist the negro boy JOHN alias WILLIS, aged between 22 and 23 years, meauring 5 feet 4 inches in height; he says he belongs to Mesers. Pike and Suthon of Napoleonville, parish of Assumption. Parish of St John the Baptist, this 30th July 1859. URSIN JACOB, Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
